channel.title: Dark Americana - Lone Star Falling (Bite Marks! Feb)
channel.description:
<!-- @page { margin: 0.79in } P { margin-bottom: 0.08in } A:link { so-language: zxx } -->
Fridays in February at 7 pm CST
Welcome to Jessup, TX where your pack has been shepherding the humans for quite some time. It's a low class, dirty town with all kind of character and whatever else the upper class people are calling “grit” these days. You're part of a low class dynasty of werewolves who have to keep the pack from fracturing.
Together as a group we'll decide what major threat has come upon our small town, be it gentrification, development of the hunting grounds, or even a rival pack or hunters. Looking for some cool cats to be some dirty dogs!
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lv8GsHGEqxeMAOzwsfr
Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lv8H7SceBgv8hDuQhMp
Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lv8HGwMXmce4U6UjW5p
Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lv8HQsAaDp7deYxsVzj
